00026 EXTERN_C_BEGIN
00027 
00028 #define LOCK "lock;"
00029 
00030 /* atomic compare and exchange 64 bit value */
00031 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_CMPXCHG64
00032 L4_INLINE int
00033 l4util_cmpxchg64(volatile l4_uint64_t * dest,
00034      l4_uint64_t cmp_val, l4_uint64_t new_val)
00035 {
00036   unsigned char ret;
00037   l4_umword_t dummy;
00038 
00039   __asm__ __volatile__
00040     (
00041 #ifdef __PIC__
00042      LOCK "xchg %%esi,%%ebx\n\t"
00043 #endif
00044      LOCK "cmpxchg8b  %5\n\t"
00045      "sete  %0\n\t"
00046 #ifdef __PIC__
00047      "xchg %%esi,%%ebx\n\t"
00048 #endif
00049      :
00050      "=a" (ret),      /* return val, 0 or 1 */
00051      "=d" (dummy)
00052      :
00053      "A"  (cmp_val),
00054      "c"  ((unsigned int)(new_val>>32ULL)),
00055 #ifdef __PIC__
00056      "S"
00057 #else
00058      "b"
00059 #endif
00060           ((unsigned int)new_val),
00061      "m"  (*dest)    /* 3 mem, destination operand */
00062      :
00063      "memory", "cc"
00064      );
00065 
00066   return ret;
00067 }
00068 
00069 /* atomic compare and exchange 32 bit value */
00070 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_CMPXCHG32
00071 L4_INLINE int
00072 l4util_cmpxchg32(volatile l4_uint32_t * dest,
00073      l4_uint32_t cmp_val, l4_uint32_t new_val)
00074 {
00075   l4_uint32_t tmp;
00076 
00077   __asm__ __volatile__
00078     (
00079      LOCK "cmpxchgl %1, %3 \n\t"
00080      :
00081      "=a" (tmp)      /* 0 EAX, return val */
00082      :
00083      "r"  (new_val), /* 1 reg, new value */
00084      "0"  (cmp_val), /* 2 EAX, compare value */
00085      "m"  (*dest)    /* 3 mem, destination operand */
00086      :
00087      "memory", "cc"
00088      );
00089 
00090   return tmp == cmp_val;
00091 }
00092 
00093 /* atomic compare and exchange 16 bit value */
00094 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_CMPXCHG16
00095 L4_INLINE int
00096 l4util_cmpxchg16(volatile l4_uint16_t * dest,
00097      l4_uint16_t cmp_val, l4_uint16_t new_val)
00098 {
00099   l4_uint16_t tmp;
00100 
00101   __asm__ __volatile__
00102     (
00103      LOCK "cmpxchgw %1, %3 \n\t"
00104      :
00105      "=a" (tmp)      /* 0  AX, return value */
00106      :
00107      "c"  (new_val), /* 1  CX, new value */
00108      "0"  (cmp_val), /* 2  AX, compare value */
00109      "m"  (*dest)    /* 3 mem, destination operand */
00110      :
00111      "memory", "cc"
00112      );
00113 
00114   return tmp == cmp_val;
00115 }
00116 
00117 /* atomic compare and exchange 8 bit value */
00118 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_CMPXCHG8
00119 L4_INLINE int
00120 l4util_cmpxchg8(volatile l4_uint8_t * dest,
00121     l4_uint8_t cmp_val, l4_uint8_t new_val)
00122 {
00123   l4_uint8_t tmp;
00124 
00125   __asm__ __volatile__
00126     (
00127      LOCK "cmpxchgb %1, %3 \n\t"
00128      :
00129      "=a" (tmp)      /* 0  AL, return value */
00130      :
00131      "c"  (new_val), /* 1  CL, new value */
00132      "0"  (cmp_val), /* 2  AL, compare value */
00133      "m"  (*dest)    /* 3 mem, destination operand */
00134      :
00135      "memory", "cc"
00136      );
00137 
00138   return tmp == cmp_val;
00139 }
00140 
00141 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_CMPXCHG
00142 L4_INLINE int
00143 l4util_cmpxchg(volatile l4_umword_t * dest,
00144                l4_umword_t cmp_val, l4_umword_t new_val)
00145 {
00146   return l4util_cmpxchg32((volatile l4_uint32_t *)dest,
00147                           (l4_uint32_t)cmp_val, (l4_uint32_t)new_val);
00148 }
00149 
00150 /* atomic exchange 32 bit value */
00151 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_XCHG32
00152 L4_INLINE l4_uint32_t
00153 l4util_xchg32(volatile l4_uint32_t * dest, l4_uint32_t val)
00154 {
00155   __asm__ __volatile__
00156     (
00157      LOCK "xchg %0, %1 \n\t"
00158      :
00159      "=r" (val)
00160      :
00161      "m" (*dest), "0" (val)
00162      :
00163      "memory"
00164     );
00165 
00166   return val;
00167 }
00168 
00169 /* atomic exchange 16 bit value */
00170 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_XCHG16
00171 L4_INLINE l4_uint16_t
00172 l4util_xchg16(volatile l4_uint16_t * dest, l4_uint16_t val)
00173 {
00174   __asm__ __volatile__
00175     (
00176      LOCK "xchg %w0, %1 \n\t"
00177      :
00178      "=r" (val)
00179      :
00180      "m" (*dest), "0" (val)
00181      :
00182      "memory"
00183     );
00184 
00185   return val;
00186 }
00187 
00188 /* atomic exchange 8 bit value */
00189 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_XCHG8
00190 L4_INLINE l4_uint8_t
00191 l4util_xchg8(volatile l4_uint8_t * dest, l4_uint8_t val)
00192 {
00193   __asm__ __volatile__
00194     (
00195      LOCK "xchg %b0, %1 \n\t"
00196      :
00197      "=r" (val)
00198      :
00199      "m" (*dest), "0" (val)
00200      :
00201      "memory"
00202     );
00203 
00204   return val;
00205 }
00206 
00207 /* atomic exchange machine width */
00208 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_XCHG
00209 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t
00210 l4util_xchg(volatile l4_umword_t * dest, l4_umword_t val)
00211 {
00212   return l4util_xchg32((volatile l4_uint32_t *)dest, (l4_uint32_t)val);
00213 }

00215 #define l4util_gen_allop(args...) \
00216 l4util_genop( 8,"b", "", args)  \
00217 l4util_genop(16,"w", "", args)  \
00218 l4util_genop(32,"l", "", args)
00219 
00220 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_ADD8
00221 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_ADD16
00222 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_ADD32
00223 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_SUB8
00224 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_SUB16
00225 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_SUB32
00226 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_AND8
00227 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_AND16
00228 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_AND32
00229 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_OR8
00230 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_OR16
00231 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_OR32
00232 /* Generate void l4util_{add,sub,and,or}{8,16,32}(*dest) */
00233 #undef l4util_genop
00234 #define l4util_genop(bit, mod, op1, opname)     \
00235 L4_INLINE void              \
00236 l4util_##opname##bit(volatile l4_uint##bit##_t* dest, l4_uint##bit##_t val) \
00237 {               \
00238   __asm__ __volatile__            \
00239     (               \
00240      LOCK #opname mod " %1,%0 \n\t"       \
00241      :                \
00242      :                \
00243      "m" (*dest), "ir" (val)          \
00244      :                \
00245      "memory"             \
00246     );                \
00247 }
00248 l4util_gen_allop(add)
00249 l4util_gen_allop(sub)
00250 l4util_gen_allop(and)
00251 l4util_gen_allop(or)
00252 
00253 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_ADD8_RES
00254 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_ADD16_RES
00255 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_ADD32_RES
00256 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_SUB8_RES
00257 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_SUB16_RES
00258 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_SUB32_RES
00259 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_AND8_RES
00260 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_AND16_RES
00261 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_AND32_RES
00262 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_OR8_RES
00263 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_OR16_RES
00264 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_OR32_RES
00265 /* Generate l4_uint{8,16,32} l4util_{add,sub,and,or}{8,16,32}_res(*dest) */
00266 #undef l4util_genop
00267 #define l4util_genop(bit, mod, op1, opname, opchar)   \
00268 L4_INLINE l4_uint##bit##_t          \
00269 l4util_##opname##bit##_res(volatile l4_uint##bit##_t* dest, \
00270          l4_uint##bit##_t val)    \
00271 {               \
00272   l4_uint##bit##_t res, old;          \
00273                 \
00274   do                \
00275     {               \
00276       old = *dest;            \
00277       res = old opchar val;         \
00278     }               \
00279   while (!l4util_cmpxchg##bit(dest, old, res));     \
00280                 \
00281   return res;             \
00282 }
00283 l4util_gen_allop(add, +)
00284 l4util_gen_allop(sub, -)
00285 l4util_gen_allop(and, &)
00286 l4util_gen_allop(or,  |)
00287 
00288 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_INC8
00289 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_INC16
00290 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_INC32
00291 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_DEC8
00292 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_DEC16
00293 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_DEC32
00294 /* Generate void l4util_{inc,dec}{8,16,32}(*dest) */
00295 #undef l4util_genop
00296 #define l4util_genop(bit, mod, op1, opname)     \
00297 L4_INLINE void              \
00298 l4util_##opname##bit(volatile l4_uint##bit##_t* dest)   \
00299 {               \
00300   __asm__ __volatile__            \
00301     (               \
00302      LOCK #opname mod " %0  \n\t"         \
00303      :                \
00304      :                \
00305      "m" (*dest)            \
00306      :                \
00307      "memory"             \
00308     );                \
00309 }
00310 l4util_gen_allop(inc)
00311 l4util_gen_allop(dec)
00312 
00313 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_INC8_RES
00314 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_INC16_RES
00315 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_INC32_RES
00316 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_DEC8_RES
00317 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_DEC16_RES
00318 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_DEC32_RES
00319 /* Generate l4_uint{8,16,32} l4util_{inc,dec}{8,16,32}_res(*dest) */
00320 #undef l4util_genop
00321 #define l4util_genop(bit, mod, op1, opname, opchar)   \
00322 L4_INLINE l4_uint##bit##_t          \
00323 l4util_##opname##bit##_res(volatile l4_uint##bit##_t* dest) \
00324 {               \
00325   l4_uint##bit##_t res, old;          \
00326                 \
00327   do                \
00328     {               \
00329       res = *dest;            \
00330       old = res opchar;           \
00331     }               \
00332   while (!l4util_cmpxchg##bit(dest, old, res));     \
00333                 \
00334   return res;             \
00335 }
00336 l4util_gen_allop(inc, ++)
00337 l4util_gen_allop(dec, --)
00338 
00339 #undef l4util_genop
00340 #undef l4util_gen_allop
00341 
00342 
00343 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_ADD
00344 L4_INLINE void
00345 l4util_atomic_add(volatile long *dest, long val)
00346 {
00347   __asm__ __volatile__(LOCK "addl %1, %0  \n"
00348                        : "=m" (*dest)
00349                        : "ri" (val), "m" (*dest));
00350 }
00351 
00352 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_INC
00353 L4_INLINE void
00354 l4util_atomic_inc(volatile long *dest)
00355 {
00356   __asm__ __volatile__(LOCK "incl %0"
00357                        : "=m" (*dest)
00358                        : "m" (*dest));
00359 }
00360

L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
